title: I never got the reset on my skin shop...
body: I heard a lot of people got resets, yet I didn't. I haven't even played the champions in my shop since last year? I only played them once in a normal and/or ARAM.

replies.body: There isn't a feature to reset content for Your Shop.  Some players may have had a reset unintentionally due to some issues when the feature was launched, though.  Sorry for the confusion.  :X

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LGskxyEn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-20T20:13:49.364+0000)
>
> There isn't a feature to reset content for Your Shop.  Some players may have had a reset unintentionally due to some issues when the feature was launched, though.  Sorry for the confusion.  :X

Did you guys redo the algorithm? All my champions are champions I have high masteries with but haven't played more than once in the past season.

I have no doubt that feedback was collecting from previous personalized stores, but I don't know the specifics exactly.  It may pull details over the last few months and find sales that the system thinks you might enjoy.  If not, just give it a shot!   They do come bundled with champs, so you could try them out for a specific role, if you have one!
